definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Santa Cruz Island, off the California coast

sentences.english: Hearing that song always reminds me of a certain night in Santa Claus.
sentences.chinese: 每當聽到這首歌，總令我想起在聖克魯斯的夜晚。

sentences.english: The quake struck near the Santa Cruz Islands, which are part of the Solomon Islands nation.
sentences.chinese: 地震發生在所羅門羣島境內的聖克魯斯羣島附近。

sentences.english: A similar system is planned for Santa Cruz island next year.
sentences.chinese: 計劃明年爲聖克魯斯島安裝同樣的系統。

sentences.english: The San Rafael Valley's topography and geology forms the headwaters of the Santa Cruz River.
sentences.chinese: 聖拉斐爾山谷的地形和地質形成聖克魯斯河的源頭。

sentences.english: The accused include prominent opposition politicians from the eastern city of Santa Cruz.
sentences.chinese: 被告包括來自東部聖克魯斯城市著名的反對派政客。

sentences.english: University of Santa Cruz is up north.
